mdx.excerpt: What is a binary search tree? In a nutshell a binary search tree is a type of tree with property  left < parent < right  for every node. Creating the tree Firstâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Building and walking a binary search tree
frontmatter.description: In this post we will see how to create a binary search tree from scratch and walk through it. Binary search tree are an important data structure as they allow fast lookup, addition and removal of items and reduces the time complexity to O(logn).
